name: Parallel Self
slogan: An App using AI to help people help themselves
description: An App to help people everywhere help themselves, to make good decisions and to become the best people they can be !

team.title: Founder & CEO
team.name: Fred Fulton Berrios
team.bioHtml: Founder @Parallel Self • Worked at @500 Startups, @Microsoft, @IFRC International Federation of Red Cross Red Crescent Societies

jobs.title: Developer
jobs.description:
Dear interested person. Firstly, thank you for taking the time to read this.

I am involve in a project called Parallel Self. The idea is to help people help themselves – help make good decisions and help them ultimately be the best they can be. The project is very much driven by the desire to create social well being in individuals as much as it is to create a self-sustaining initiative creating strong financial returns.

Various concepts and frameworks have been developed as well as some visual mock-ups of the concept too. There is also a growing group of highly talented and successful supporters and advisers.

We now need to find someone to help us build out these mock-ups and frameworks into a 1st version demo / prototype - MVP - to have something tangible to work with and share with those who will provide seed funding. We are looking for someone to do the coding for us and build this MVP prototype quickly and very cost-effectively.

Some funds & / or some equity could be available for the right person or persons.

Thank you very much in advance for your interest. We look forwards to hearing from you.

All the best
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Dear interested person. Firstly, thank you for taking the time to read this.

I am involve in a project called Parallel Self. The idea is to help people help themselves – help make good decisions and help them ultimately be the best they can be. The project is very much driven by the desire to create social well being in individuals as much as it is to create a self-sustaining initiative creating strong financial returns.

Various concepts and frameworks have been developed as well as some visual mock-ups of the concept too. There is also a growing group of highly talented and successful supporters and advisers.

We now need to find someone to help us build out these mock-ups and frameworks into a 1st version demo / prototype - MVP - to have something tangible to work with and share with those who will provide seed funding. We are looking for someone to do the coding for us and build this MVP prototype quickly and very cost-effectively.

Some funds & / or some equity could be available for the right person or persons.

Thank you very much in advance for your interest. We look forwards to hearing from you.

All the best
